price: 202. Ba oyo wana nde bazali na mbano na maye basalaki; mpe Allah azali lombango na kofuta.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّمَّا كَسَبُواْۚ وَٱللَّهُ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ulāika lahum naṣībun mimmā kasabū wal-lahu sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
